rouze was a goblin from the ruined mines of Dekanter, that was further transformed into a mongrelmanWhile the terms "mongrelmen" or "mongrelfolk" never appear in the The Nether Scroll novel, the story does include creatures fitting their description that were associated with Beast Lord, who historically has created mongrelmen. by the undead mind flayer known across the North as the Beast Lord.
Grouze was once a warrior within his goblin community, before he was abducted by the Beast Lord and transformed into what his fellow tribe members referred to as a "demon".
Despite the monstrous form he was given, Grouze was still recognizable by scars he retained from his goblinoid life. After his death, none of Grouzes  former tribe members would touch his body nor any of his belongings, for fear they would suffer from the same affliction that warped his body.
